messages.title: 3 things to remember
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have a local councillor with a record of action and success in our area. The Liberal Democrats want to introduce local fairness. Fairness in reducing tax, fairness in education and fairness in politics. The Greens can't win here - only the Liberal Democrats can beat the Conservatives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduce local fairness, reduce tax, ensure fairness in education and politics.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Greens can't win here - only the Liberal Democrats can beat the Conservatives.

images.caption: Picture of David Hallas, General Election candidate
